extendedInfo.description: Playbook is a FREE mobile application and online sports community for recreational sports enthusiasts across the globe. Playbook is a common platform created for anyone and everyone that plays or organizes any type of Sports Event (like leagues, tournaments, races, camps, clinics, classes, etc.). Players can join their leagues and events on Playbook to instantly connect with other players, share comments and photos, create and manage their league statistics and event results, and access all current and previous league and event information forever. League and Event Organizers (Commissioners) can upload their leagues and events to Playbook, publish news and updates on their Playbook Club Page, and deliver important league and event information (as well as send mobile messages) directly to their players' smart phones for FREE. There is finally an official mobile application and online sports community for recreational sports enthusiasts across the globe!  Join Playbook and create your FREE sports profile today!

reviews.title: Great customer service
reviews.comment: I had origanally had put a lower rating. I had sent them some concerns i had with the app. With such they contacted me by phone rather quickly and helped me through things i was getting wrong. after such this is a great app for what it was made to do. It will work for any sports orginization as a medium for your website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t add sports
reviews.comment: No ability to add sports. Empty window on DROID x
reviews.author: A Google User
